membershipLevels.name: NP Membership Level
membershipLevels.description: For non-profit organizations that seek collaboration and support without incurring any fees. This membership is designed to help charitable and non-commercial entities thrive in their missions.

membershipLevels.name: Bronze Membership Level
membershipLevels.description: A cost-effective plan tailored for small businesses or startups seeking foundational support and opportunities to grow.

membershipLevels.name: Silver Membership Level
membershipLevels.description: Perfect for growing businesses that require more exposure and advanced resources to scale operations and reach a wider audience.

membershipLevels.name: Gold Membership Level
membershipLevels.description: An elite membership plan designed for established organizations aiming for maximum visibility and influence within the network.
